org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.single.cypher.operators.expand.functions

Class PostProcessExpandEmbedding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.AbstractRichFunction
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichFlatMapFunction<ExpandEmbedding,Embedding>
        • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.matching.single.cypher.operators.expand.functions.PostProcessExpandEmbedding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.FlatMapFunction<ExpandEmbedding,Embedding>, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.Function, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichFunction

    public class PostProcessExpandEmbedding
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichFlatMapFunction<ExpandEmbedding,Embedding>
    Post-processes the expand iteration results
    1. Remove paths below lower bound length
    2. Remove results that do not match circle condition
    3. Turn intermediate results into embeddings
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
